snippet: Mark Marmor, president of Omega Elite, discusses the headaches inherent in being a frequent business traveler.
abstract: Joe Sharkey On the Road column features Omega Elite president Mark Marmor discussing the headaches inherent in being a frequent business traveler.
lead_paragraph: Mark Marmor, president of Omega Elite, discusses the headaches inherent in being a frequent business traveler.
